title: Crypto Futures Funding Rates Normalize After Bitcoin Drops to $35.6K
description: Large movements in spot markets led to open interest surging to $35 billion over the weekend, indicating highly leveraged bets from traders hoping for even higher prices.

title: Rediscovering Music History: How AI Restored Decades-Old Tracks

title: AI-Powered Tool Offers Insight on Combating Plastic Pollution
description: Plastic pollution has become a global crisis, with both plastic production and waste expected to reach alarming levels by 2050. In response, scientists from UC Santa Barbara and UC Berkeley have unveiled a groundbreaking AI-powered online tool aimed at providing a roadmap to combat plastic pollution. This tool offers unprecedented insights into how nations worldwide ... Read more

title: Crypto hub Blockchain.com raises $110m in Series E funding
description: Blockchain.com’s latest funding reportedly leaves its valuation at less than half of its $14 billion back in 2022. Blockchain.com, the company behind a cryptocurrency wallet and an exchange, has raised $110 in a Series E funding round led by British…

title: Crypto Analyst Predicts Abrupt Bitcoin Rally, Says BTC Still in Massive Uptrend Despite Recent Corrective Move
description:
An analyst who’s been making timely Bitcoin (BTC) calls recently believes that the crypto king is still poised for a big surge despite yesterday’s drop. In a new video update, Credible Crypto tells his 351,400 followers on the social media platform X that Bitcoin may be in the latter stages of a wave four corrective […]
